analysis.description:
IcoPhaseManagement.close (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#351-358) sends eth to arbitrary user
	Dangerous calls:
	- ! msg.sender.send(this.balance) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#356-358)

IcoPhaseManagement.abandonedFundWithdrawal (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#426-434) uses a dangerous strict equality:
	- ! icoAbandoned || abandonedIcoBalances[msg.sender] == 0

Reentrancy in IcoPhaseManagement.abandon (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#383-419):
	External calls:
	- paymentPerShare = this.balance / smartInvestmentFundToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#390-391)
	- numberTokenHolders = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#391-395)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- icoAbandoned (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#409)

SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenOwnerAdd.tokenHolderCount (local variable @ /unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#208-211) shadows:
	- SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount (function @ /unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#151-153)

SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenOwnerRemove.tokenHolderCount (local variable @ /unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#224-226) shadows:
	- SmartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount (function @ /unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#151-153)

IcoPhaseManagement.abandon has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#397-400)

IcoPhaseManagement.abandon has external calls inside a loop:
	- etherToSend = paymentPerShare * smartInvestmentFundToken.balanceOf(addr) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#400-404)

DividendManager.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- i < siftContract.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#617-630)

DividendManager.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- addr = siftContract.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#620-621)

DividendManager.fallback has external calls inside a loop:
	- dividend = paymentPerShare * siftContract.balanceOf(addr) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#622-624)

Reentrancy in IcoPhaseManagement.abandon (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#383-419):
	External calls:
	- paymentPerShare = this.balance / smartInvestmentFundToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#390-391)
	- numberTokenHolders = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#391-395)
	- addr = smartInvestmentFundToken.tokenHolder(i) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#397-400)
	- etherToSend = paymentPerShare * smartInvestmentFundToken.balanceOf(addr) (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#400-404)
	State variables written after the call(s):
	- abandonedIcoBalances (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#406-408)

Reentrancy in IcoPhaseManagement.abandon (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#383-419):
	External calls:
	- paymentPerShare = this.balance / smartInvestmentFundToken.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#390-391)

Reentrancy in DividendManager.fallback (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#607-638):

	- validSupply = siftContract.totalSupply() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#610-613)
	- i < siftContract.tokenHolderCount() (/unique_chucks/22/0x9599954b6ade1f00f36a95cdf3a1b773ba3be19a.sol#617-630)
